newsitem.title: EU: Official Journal contents - OJ L 180 of July 9, 1997.
newsitem.headline: Official Journal contents - OJ L 180 of July 9, 1997.

text.p: (Note - contents are displayed in reverse order to that in the printed Journal)
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 97/43/EURATOM of 30 June 1997 on health protection of individuals against the dangers of ionizing radiation in relation to medical exposure, and repealing Directive 84/466/Euratom

COMMISSION DECISION of 30 June 1997 providing for the release of the minimum stocks and the partial release of the carried forward stocks held by the sugar undertakings established in Spain, in order to ensure supplies to the southern region of Spain during the period from 1 July to 30 November 1997 (Only the Spanish text is authentic)

COMMISSION DECISION of 30 June 1997 amending Decision 93/24/EEC and Decision 93/244/EEC and concerning additional guarantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined to regions free of the disease in Austria (Text with EEA relevance)
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 97/40/EC of 25 June 1997 amending Directive 93/113/EC concerning the use and marketing of enzymes, micro-organisms and their preparations in animal nutrition
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1318/97 of 8 July 1997 amending representative prices and additional duties for the import of certain products in the sugar sector
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1317/97 of 8 July 1997 establishing the standard import values for determining the entry price of certain fruit and vegetables
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1316/97 of 8 July 1997 fixing, for June 1997, the specific agricultural conversion rate for the amount of the reimbursement of storage costs in the sugar sector
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1315/97 of 8 July 1997 on the issue of import licences for garlic originating in China

COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1314/97 of 8 July 1997 opening import quotas in respect of special preferential raw cane sugar from the ACP States and India for supply to refineries in the period 1 July 1997 to 28 February 1998
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1313/97 of 8 July 1997 altering, for the 1997/98 marketing year, the adjustment aid and additional aid to the sugar refining industry

COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1312/97 of 8 July 1997 amending Regulation (EC) No 3582/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2073/92 on promoting consumption in the Community and expanding the markets for milk and milk products

COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1311/97 of 8 July 1997 amending for the third time Regulation (EC) No 2177/96 introducing preventive distillation as provided for in Article 38 of Council Regulation (EEC) No 822/87 for the 1996/97 wine year
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1310/97 of 30 June 1997 amending Regulation (EEC) No 4064/89 on the control of concentrations between undertakings END OF DOCUMENT.
